issue.title: [C++] Support double-conversion<3.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, we require `double-conversion>=3.1` but distributions are all mostly on 2.1 or 3.0. We should support them 

Nice side-effect is that `double-conversion` is not good in updating their version number. So thus 3.0 report itself as 2.0.1 and 3.1.x as 3.0 in the CMake definitions. Thus we cannot rely on their version number reporting for detecting the version.
